<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Remove the EE licence key</h1><Badges badges={["ee"]} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v2/ee-license/release-license-key"}></MethodEndpoint>



This will remove the licence key from the instance.
